description:
The easiest, fastest and most complete industrial computed tomography software on the market.
	3D X-ray has never been easier with an intuitive interface, a guided wizard for easy CT reconstructions,
	automatic parallelization for systems with multiple CPUs and GPUs, and OpenGL based 3D volume rendering.
displayName: efX-CT Computed Tomography Reconstruction and Visualization
summary: Computed Tomography Reconstruction and Visualization with automatic parallelization for systems
author: North Star Imaging Inc.
